channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-3540] Region stuck in CLOSED state
item.description: I inserted 100G or so of data and got a region stuck in a CLOSED state. Different region servers kept trying to open it, but they failed to transition OFFLINE->OPENING because it was in a CLOSED state.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
